name: Redline (itch)
description:
Hit The Redline

Redline is a little project I put together in 72 gloriously pain-staking hours for the Score Space game jam. Push your polygons to the limit in some beautifully rendered 3D physics based racing. There's a single vehicle currently available which can be driven around 3 unique race tracks. You'll go up against 4-10 AI racers depending on which track you're on, and they'll all be fighting you for 1st place.

To tie into the Score Space rules, the game does indeed have a global leaderboard for the fastest track times for each course. You'll race around 3 laps on each course to get your final time. The fastest times will be updated live for all to see in-game. Only the top 3 times for each course are recorded and if someone beats someone else, their name and time is replaced with the new fastest.

See how quickly you can dash around the various courses, pick a favourite and learn the short-cuts to try and be the fastest. Beware of hitting other racers and scenery as they can result in some undesirable delays to your lap times, as you can imagine.
